attributes.action: recommend Brian Blessed for a knighthood in the Queen's New Years Honours List of 2009
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Brian Blessed is more than just an actor and television personality, he is a national treasure.
He has forged a longstanding and ongoing commitment to entertainment & showbusiness which has lasted nearly fifty years in popular entertainment as well as having scaled Kilimanjaro, Aconcagua & Everest AND being the oldest man to trek on foot to the magnetic North Pole.
Whilst any honour is exactly that, we feel it highly fitting and rewarding that Mr Blessed be given one of the highest honours his & our country can bestow.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
